meter_reading.notes: The odometer wheels read 02271.0, which is 2271.0 m³. The red needle is positioned between 0.03 and 0.04 on the circular dial, approximately at 0.038. Following the rule to interpolate to 0.01 resolution, this rounds up to 0.04 m³ for the dial reading. The calculated angle corresponds to the actual needle position of 0.038.
